DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor find good way treat cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study biomarkers tumor tissue sample patient peripheral T-cell lymphoma natural killer cell neoplasm .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Tumor Tissue Samples From Patients With Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Natural Killer Cell Neoplasms
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify mutation oncogene tumor suppressor peripheral T-cell lymphoma natural killer ( NK ) cell neoplasm . - To delineate mechanism mediate oncogenic effect clinical prognostic significance disease . - To perform comprehensive mutation analysis via whole exome resequencing panel peripheral T-cell NK lymphoma . OUTLINE : Fixed paraffin-embedded tumor tissue sample analyze mutation Illumina HiSeq platform . Sequencing read perform GAPipeline version 1.5.1 mapping human genome perform use MAQ software version 0.7.1 . Genes harbor validate somatic mutation amplify PCR analyze Sanger resequencing .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosed peripheral Tcell lymphoma natural killer cell neoplasms Available fresh tumor sample patient treat ECOGE2404 normal DNA ( nonECOG ) sample PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
